pages.text: You can play music from $(l:iammusicplayer:item_or_block_with_feature/cassette_tape)Cassette Tapes$(/l), play radio streams using the $(l:iammusicplayer:item_or_block_with_feature/antenna)Antenna$(/l), and play music directly from playlists using the $(l:iammusicplayer:item_or_block_with_feature/parabolic_antenna)Parabolic Antenna$(/l).
